task_9.description: Place the green tissue between the red cup and the blue cup
task_9.required_objects: green tissue, red plastic cup, blue plastic cup
task_9.initial_setup: The red cup is upright on the left side, 20 cm from the edge. The blue cup is upright on the right side, 20 cm from the edge. A yellow tissue is folded and placed near the red cup.
task_9.final_state: The green tissue is flat and positioned between the red and blue cups, 10 cm from each. The yellow tissue is moved to the far right corner.
